column4: okay - on our eth0 we have the correct IP address assigned from the new datacenter - but TX and RX under ifconfig are showing errors - recommended next steps?
if it says errors and carrier, you probably have a negotiation problem
no incrementing on anything but the error counter
check to see if there are any errors on the switch side, check out http://www.cisco.com/en/US/products/hw/switches/ps700/products_tech_note09186a008015bfd6.shtml
